trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data supplied by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de dados fornecidos pelo <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a dataflow block that is a source of data.
trans-unit.target: Representa um bloco de fluxo de dados que é uma origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being consumed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> da mensagem que é consumida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> consuming the message.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> que consome a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully consumed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem foi consumida com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to accept and consume a T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader previously offered by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> vinculado para aceitar e consumir um T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader anteriormente oferecido por este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the consumed message.
trans-unit.target: O valor da mensagem consumida.

trans-unit.source: This may correspond to a different <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> instance than was previously reserved and passed as the <paramref name="messageHeader" /> to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode corresponder a uma instância <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> diferente que foi reservada anteriormente e passada como o <paramref name="messageHeader" /> para <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />.

trans-unit.source: The consuming <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> must use the returned value instead of the value passed as <paramref name="messageValue" /> through <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1.OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> de consumo deve usar o valor retornado em vez do valor passado como <paramref name="messageValue" /> por meio de <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1.OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: If the message requested is not available, the return value will be null.
trans-unit.target: Se a mensagem solicitada não estiver disponível, o valor retornado será nulo.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to consume <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: Somente <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instâncias vinculados a este <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instância pode usar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>, e ele só deve ser usado para consumir <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instâncias anteriormente oferecidos por essa fonte para o destino.

trans-unit.source: The messageHeader is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O messageHeader não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The target is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O destino é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to which to connect this source.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> ao qual essa fonte será conectada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> instance that configures the link.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> que configura o link.

trans-unit.source: Links the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Vincula o <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> ao <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An IDisposable that, upon calling Dispose, will unlink the source from the target.
trans-unit.target: Um IDisposable que, após chamar Dispose, desvinculará a origem do destino.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic) or <paramref name="linkOptions" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> é nulo (Nothing no Visual Basic) ou <paramref name="linkOptions" /> é nulo (Nothing no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the reserved message being released.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> da mensagem reservada que é liberada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> releasing the message it previously reserved.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> que libera a mensagem reservada anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to release a previously reserved <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> vinculado para liberar um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> reservado anteriormente por este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use `ReleaseReservation`, and it must only be used to release <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously and successfully reserved by the target.
trans-unit.target: Somente <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instâncias vinculados a este <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instância pode usar `ReleaseReservation`, e só deve ser usada para liberar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instâncias anteriormente e com êxito são reservadas pelo destino.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="messageHeader" /> não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="target" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> did not have the message reserved.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="target" /> não tinha a mensagem reservada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being reserved.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> da mensagem que é reservada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> reserving the message.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> que reserva a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to reserve a previously offered <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> vinculado para reservar um <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> oferecido anteriormente por este <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully reserved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem foi reservada com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to reserve <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: Somente <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instâncias vinculados a este <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instância pode usar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>, e só deve ser usado para reservar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instâncias anteriormente oferecidos por essa fonte para o destino.

trans-unit.source: If `true` is returned, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> must subsequently call either <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A> for this message.
trans-unit.target: Se `true` for retornado, o <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> subsequentemente deve chamar <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A> ou <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A> para esta mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets.
trans-unit.target: Falha ao fazer isso pode resultar na fonte sendo não é possível propagar mensagens adicionais para este ou outros destinos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> não deve ser chamado enquanto o destino está mantendo todos os bloqueios internos.

trans-unit.source: Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.
trans-unit.target: Isso violará a hierarquia de bloqueio necessária para evitar deadlocks em uma rede de fluxo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="messageHeader" /> não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="target" /> é <see langword="null" />.
